parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the center mark in the center mark set (see Remarks )

title: ICenterMark.IsDeleted
description: Gets whether the specified center mark is deleted in this center mark set.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the center mark in the center mark set (see Remarks )

returns: True if the specified center mark in this center mark set is deleted, false if not
remarks:
You can use a value from 0 to the
number of center marks in a center mark set
for the Index parameter.
